sections.heading: Manufacturer,
sections.text:
wholesale dealer and retail dealer to maintain with Department current mailing

and electronic mail addresses.

sections.heading: Imposition
sections.text: of excise tax on cigarettes by governing body of Indian reservation or colony.

sections.heading: Cigarette
sections.text: taxes are direct taxes upon consumer.

sections.heading: Revenue
sections.text:
stamp to be affixed to each package of cigarettes; tribal stamp required on

each package of cigarettes sold on tribal land or by Indian tribe.

sections.heading: Design
sections.text:
and printing of revenue stamps; identification of dealer on stamp; regulations

concerning use of metered stamping machine.

sections.heading: Sale
sections.text: of revenue stamps by Department; payment for revenue stamps; regulations.

sections.heading: Department
sections.text: to fix maximum amount of revenue stamps upon application by wholesale dealer.

sections.heading: Due
sections.text:
date for deferred payment owing for revenue stamps; extension; conditions under

which Department may suspend without notice privilege to defer payment.

sections.heading: Sale
sections.text: of cigarette revenue stamps by sheriff and city officers.

sections.heading: Requirements
sections.text:
for and restrictions on affixing stamps; handling of unstamped cigarettes for

sale or distribution outside State.

sections.heading: Allowance
sections.text: of discounts for services rendered by dealers.

sections.heading: Destruction
sections.text:
of spoiled or unusable stamps upon written authorization of State Board of

Examiners.

sections.heading: Monthly
sections.text:
reports of wholesale dealers: Due date; contents and form; separate report for

each facility; extension of deadline; correction of errors; reporting of

additional information.

sections.heading: Maintenance
sections.text:
and retention of records regarding certain transactions of wholesale dealers,

retail dealers and manufacturers.

sections.heading: Access
Remittances
sections.text:
of taxes and license fees to Department; allocation and appropriation of

remittances of taxes; monthly reports by Department; deposit and use of

remittances of license fees.

sections.heading: Duties
sections.text:
of retail dealers and vending machine operators; unlawful possession of

unstamped cigarettes; seizure and disposition of unstamped cigarettes and

vending machines.

sections.heading: Tax
sections.text:
refunds; wholesale dealer required to return unused tribal stamps after ceasing

operations.

sections.heading: Exemption
sections.text:
for cigarettes exported from State; notice to Department of Taxation and state

of destination; penalty.

sections.heading: Transportation
sections.text: of cigarettes: Invoices to accompany shipment.

sections.heading: Transportation
sections.text: of unstamped cigarettes; inspection of vehicles for contraband cigarettes.

sections.heading: Sale
sections.text: or distribution of tax-free cigarettes by vending machine prohibited.

sections.heading: Duties
sections.text: of person who accepts order for delivery sale; civil penalties.

sections.heading: Submission
sections.text:
to Department of monthly reports by persons selling, transferring, shipping or

delivering cigarettes, roll-your-own tobacco or smokeless tobacco into this

State; submission to Attorney General and United States Department of the

Treasury of certain information; confidentiality.

sections.heading: Prevention
sections.text:
of competition by wholesale dealer; purchase of cigarettes below cost by retail

dealer; penalty; prima facie evidence.

sections.heading: Adoption
sections.text: of regulations by Nevada Tax Commission.

sections.heading: Determination
sections.text: of cost of cigarettes to wholesale dealer.

sections.heading: Selling
sections.text: price of wholesale dealer in certain circumstances.

sections.heading: Sale
sections.text: by wholesale dealer of cigarettes bought from another wholesale dealer.

sections.heading: Contract
sections.text: in violation of provisions is void.

sections.heading: Action
sections.text:
to prevent, restrain or enjoin a violation or threatened violation of

provisions; action for damages and costs.

sections.heading: Unlawful
sections.text:
acts regarding licenses or stamps; unlawful possession of unstamped cigarettes;

penalty.

sections.heading: Prohibited
sections.text:
acts by wholesale or retail dealer; prohibited acts regarding cigarettes

manufactured for export outside United States; penalties; seizure and

destruction of certain unlawfully stamped cigarettes.

sections.heading: Unlawful
sections.text: sale or possession of contraband tobacco products; penalties.

sections.heading: Penalty
sections.text: for exporting, importing or possessing contraband tobacco products.

sections.heading: Authority
sections.text: to search for evidence of violation.

sections.heading: Seizure
sections.text:
and disposition of counterfeit stamps, contraband tobacco products, machinery

used to manufacture contraband tobacco products and unlawfully used cigarette

rolling machines; additional penalty.

sections.heading: Forfeiture
sections.text:
of property on premises of wholesale or retail dealer who commits certain

fraudulent acts.

sections.heading: Penalty
sections.text: for exportation of unstamped cigarettes to unauthorized persons.

sections.heading: Imposition,
sections.text:
rate and collection of tax; exemptions; retention of portion by wholesale

dealer; penalty. [Effective through June 30, 2027.]

sections.heading: Unlawful
sections.text: to sell products on which tax is not paid.

sections.heading: Monthly
sections.text: reports of wholesale dealers: Contents; accompaniment by tax owed.

sections.heading: Records
sections.text: required of retail and wholesale dealers; period for retention.

sections.heading: Remittance
sections.text: of tax; credit to State General Fund.

sections.heading: Imposition
sections.text: and collection of tax by governing body of Indian reservation or colony.

sections.heading: Allowance
sections.text: of refund for certain taxes paid.

sections.heading: Certification
sections.text: of excess amount collected; credit and refund.

sections.heading: Limitations
sections.text:
on claim for refund or credit; form and contents of claim; failure to file

claim constitutes waiver; service of notice of rejection of claim.

sections.heading: Injunction
sections.text:
or other process to prevent collection of tax prohibited; filing of claim is

condition precedent to maintaining action for refund.

sections.heading: Action
sections.text: for refund: Period for commencement; venue; waiver.

sections.heading: Rights
sections.text:
of claimant upon failure of Department to mail notice of action on claim;

allocation of judgment for claimant.

sections.heading: Allowance
sections.text: of interest in judgment for amount illegally collected.

sections.heading: Action
sections.text: for recovery of erroneous refund: Jurisdiction; venue; prosecution.

sections.heading: Payment
sections.text:
to wholesale dealer for cigarettes and other tobacco products purchased by

retail dealer: Time for payment; prohibition of and penalty for extension of

credit; investigations and hearings.

sections.heading: Restriction
sections.text:
on collection by Department of tax for products sold on Indian reservation or

colony.

sections.heading: Sale
sections.text:
and distribution of cigarettes, cigarette paper and tobacco, vapor and nicotine

products to person under 21 years of age prohibited; age verification through

enhanced controls; civil penalty; notice of civil infraction; denial of

liability for civil infraction; payment and disposition of civil penalty.

sections.heading: Civil
sections.text: penalties for certain violations; penalty for late payment of tax.

sections.heading: Enforcement:
sections.text: Authority of Attorney General and district attorneys; duty of peace officers.

sections.heading: Wholesale
sections.text: dealer of other tobacco products� defined.

sections.heading: Maintenance
sections.text:
and distribution of list of licenses and licensees and of Indian tribes from

which Department does not collect tax.

sections.text: on issuance, maintenance and renewal of licenses.

sections.heading: Issuance
sections.text: of license to certain applicants without payment of fees.

sections.heading: Prohibition
Period
sections.text: of validity of license; renewal; fees.

sections.heading: Counties,
sections.text: cities and towns may require business licenses.

sections.heading: Retention
sections.text:
of records; inspection, copying and auditing of records by Department;

verification of information by licensees; subpoenas.

sections.heading: Suspension
sections.text: or revocation of license; civil penalties; powers and duties of Department.

sections.heading: Procedure
sections.text: for suspension and revocation of license; regulations.

sections.heading: Agreement
sections.text:
with Indian tribe to implement this chapter orchapter

370Aof NRS.

sections.heading: Certification
sections.text:
by manufacturers: Execution and delivery; form and contents; supplemental

certification.

sections.heading: Certification
sections.text:
by manufacturers: Prerequisites to inclusion of brand family; maintenance of

certain pertinent information.

sections.heading: Directory
sections.text:
of manufacturers, brand families and styles of cigarettes: Duties of

Department; judicial review of exclusion from directory.

sections.heading: Department
sections.text:
required to notify wholesale dealer or retail dealer of certain changes to

directory of manufacturers, brand families and styles of cigarettes; duties of

wholesale dealer or retail dealer upon receiving notice.

sections.heading: Nonresident
sections.text:
or foreign nonparticipating manufacturers and wholesale dealers: Agent for

service of process.

sections.heading: Bond
sections.text:
of nonparticipating manufacturer: Posting requirements; amount; execution;

application of amount collected by State; regulations.

sections.heading: Liability
sections.text:
of wholesale dealer for required escrow deposits; prepayment by

nonparticipating manufacturer of amount of escrow deposit.

sections.heading: Liability
sections.text: of importer for required escrow deposit and certain reports.

sections.heading: Distributor
sections.text:
required to maintain and submit records; sharing of information between

Department and Attorney General; proof from nonparticipating manufacturer of

qualified escrow fund; distributor and manufacturers required to provide

additional information upon request.

sections.heading: Account
sections.text: for Tobacco Enforcement: Creation; administration; use.

sections.heading: Attorney
sections.text:
General: Application for grants; acceptance and deposit of gifts, grants and

donations.

sections.heading: Unlawful
sections.text: acts; penalties; violation constitutes deceptive trade practice.

sections.heading: Civil
sections.text:
penalty: Noncompliance of wholesale dealer or manufacturer; failure to pay;

deposit.

sections.heading: Civil
sections.text:
penalty: False or inaccurate certification by wholesale dealer or

nonparticipating manufacturer; deposit; failure to pay.

sections.heading: Suspension,
sections.text:
revocation and reinstatement of license of wholesale dealer whose license is

suspended or revoked in another state; denial of listing in, removal from and

reinstatement to directory of nonparticipating manufacturer and its brand

families and styles of cigarettes.

sections.heading: Action
sections.text:
for injunction or enforcement; recovery of costs; disgorgement of profits;

remedies and penalties cumulative.
